item.title: Lichess Elite Analysis
item.description: You can check out the source code I used the Lichess Elite Database, which only contains players over 2400 playing against opponents rated higher than 2200 and analyzed the latest version available using Python. Top Openings These are the most commonly played openings in the dataset: Indian Game, played 12941 times Modern Defense, played 11642 times Sicilian Defense: Closed, played 10625 times Pirc Defense, played 8924 times Queen’s Pawn Game, played 7588 times Caro-Kann Defense, played 6089 times Trompowsky Attack, played 6088 times Benoni Defense: Old Benoni, played 5759 times King’s Indian Attack, played 5684 times Queen’s Pawn Game: Mason Variation, played 5514 times Sicilian Defense, played 5445 times Horwitz Defense, played 5181 times Zukertort Opening: Sicilian Invitation, played 4965 times Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation, played 4935 times Queen’s Pawn Game: London System, played 4298 times Queen’s Pawn Game: Zukertort Variation, played 4278 times Sicilian Defense: Alapin Variation, played 4076 times Nimzo-Larsen Attack: Classical Variation, played 4049 times Sicilian Defense: Old Sicilian, played 4032 times Modern Defense: Standard Defense, played 4000 times
item.content:
You can check out the source code

I used the Lichess Elite Database, which only contains players over 2400 playing against opponents rated higher than 2200 and analyzed the latest version available using Python.

Top Openings

These are the most commonly played openings in the dataset:

  1. Indian Game, played 12941 times
  2. Modern Defense, played 11642 times
  3. Sicilian Defense: Closed, played 10625 times
  4. Pirc Defense, played 8924 times
  5. Queen’s Pawn Game, played 7588 times
  6. Caro-Kann Defense, played 6089 times
  7. Trompowsky Attack, played 6088 times
  8. Benoni Defense: Old Benoni, played 5759 times
  9. King’s Indian Attack, played 5684 times
  10. Queen’s Pawn Game: Mason Variation, played 5514 times
  11. Sicilian Defense, played 5445 times
  12. Horwitz Defense, played 5181 times
  13. Zukertort Opening: Sicilian Invitation, played 4965 times
  14. Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation, played 4935 times
  15. Queen’s Pawn Game: London System, played 4298 times
  16. Queen’s Pawn Game: Zukertort Variation, played 4278 times
  17. Sicilian Defense: Alapin Variation, played 4076 times
  18. Nimzo-Larsen Attack: Classical Variation, played 4049 times
  19. Sicilian Defense: Old Sicilian, played 4032 times
  20. Modern Defense: Standard Defense, played 4000 times
